evidence.claim: Rex Health Ventures utilizes AWS services including Lambda and RDS for serverless applications and databases.
The company confirms compliance with HIPAA regulations for healthcare data management.
Rex Health Ventures employs FHIR for interoperability with healthcare systems.
Integration patterns include RESTful APIs to connect with various healthcare EHRs.
Use of X12 EDI transaction set for billing processes and claims submission.

icp.icp_reason: Rex Health Ventures operates in healthcare with a focus on HIPAA compliance and X12 functionality.
